title: An automated protocol to construct flexibility parameters for classical forcefields: applications to metal–organic frameworks
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22714-22762
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01859A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Reza Ghanavati, Alma C. Escobosa, Thomas A. Manz
This article introduces an automated protocol for optimizing the flexibility parameters (to be used in classical forcefields) through regularized linear regression and applies this new method to 116 metal–organic frameworks.
